page.title: 08 CLUBS
page.content: The majority of the citizens interviewed prefered to join clubs instead of staying at home and watching television.Most agreed that more clubs and societies were required in the area,to keep children 'off the streets'. In Loggerheads there is a Craft Class held at the school,which has the ability to accomodate at least 100 members.Several girls lead Girl Guides in the Mold area.Children of the area are encouraged to attend such Clubs to extend their sporting abilities,e.g. Football and Netball Clubs. The survey showed that of the Clubs attended,the majority were in Mold.
